description: Try our easy to follow Lemongrass & Ginger Beef Bowls  recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bowl,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Dairy free
name: Lemongrass & Ginger Beef Bowls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Woolworths Heart Smart Extra Lean Beef Mince
1 stick lemongrass, finely chopped (white part only)
0.5 red onion, thinly sliced in to rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Add beef and cook, breaking up lumps with a wooden spoon, for 4 mins or until well browned.
Add ginger and lemongrass, then cook, stirring for 30 secs or until fragrant. Add soy sauce and 1 tbs water, and stir to combine. Remove pan from heat.
Heat brown rice and cook zucchini spaghetti according to packet instructions.
Divide rice, zucchini, onion and beef mixture among bowls. Sprinkle with chilli and coriander. Serve with lime cheeks.
